author: joeysantoro
content: <@365300888354422794> question for you, are there any naming conventions for extensions of existing eips

author: joeysantoro
content: for example EIP-7535 is an extension of EIP-4626

author: joeysantoro
content: could be called EIP-4626a or b or some other pre/suffix

author: lightclient
content: no naming convention currently, usually just a completely different number

author: joeysantoro
content: do you see any value in allowing for canonical derivative naming or more informal like: EIP-7535: Native ETH EIP-4626 Vaults
